PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-06822009-04-30,  ,  ,  ,  CEAA
ActCanadian Environmental Assessment Act
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE INFRASTRUCTURE PROJECTS ENVIRONMENTAL ASSESSMENT ADAPTATION REGULATIONS: certain funding initiatives will also be added to the Infrastructure Projects Environmental Assessment Adaptation Regulations to allow projects funded under those programs, that cannot be excluded and trigger both federal and provincial environmental assessments, to be considered for substitution in accordance with the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0132 Publication Date: 2009-05-13
